title: Colin Cowherd Podcast Prime Cuts - 2022 Preseason Special with Vikings HC Kevin O’Connell ,Mary Kay Cabot, Mike Silver and Dave Wannstedt
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast Prime Cuts - 2022 Preseason Special with Vikings HC Kevin O’Connell ,Mary Kay Cabot, Mike Silver and Dave Wannstedt
description:
This is Prime Cuts! The best of The Colin Cowherd Podcast 2022 Preseason Special. 

We’re getting you ready for Week 1 with (3:00) rookie Vikings head coach Kevin O’Connell discussing how he was introduced to Sean McVay, McVay’s offensive influence, and why it’s important for him to connect with Kirk Cousins.

Then, longtime Browns beat writer Mary Kay Cabot on why Kevin Stefanski is uniquely qualified to weather the nuclear Watson drama, what it’s like to cover the Watson beat as a woman, and if Baker Mayfield could have been the Browns starter under different circumstances.

Next, longtime NFL writer - and host of the Open Mike podcast - Mike Silver joins Colin to discuss his article reporting Jimmy Garoppolo’s penchant for repeatedly “ghosting” the Niners in the offseason, if the Bucs could make a move for Jimmy G, why Tom Brady didn’t end up playing for Jon Gruden’s Raiders in 2020.

Finally , former Bears & Dolphins HC and Cowboys DC Dave Wannstedt on if Kenny Pickett should be the Steelers Week 1 starter, if Tom Brady’s extended training camp leave could result in a slow start for the Bucs, if the Bears should pay Roquan Smith or trade him for assets, if Justin Fields will make it to a third year in Chicago.

Follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
